comment: A generating unit whose prime mover could be a steam turbine, combustion turbine, or diesel engine.
description: Adapted from CIM and https://github.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/ data models

contents.name: CAESPlant
contents.comment: A thermal generating unit may be a member of a compressed air energy storage plant.

contents.name: CogenerationPlant
contents.comment: A thermal generating unit may be a member of a cogeneration plant.

contents.name: CombinedCyclePlant
contents.comment: A thermal generating unit may be a member of a combined cycle plant.

contents.name: FossilFuels
contents.comment: A thermal generating unit may have one or more fossil fuels.
